        public static boolean setupWorkDirectory(java.lang.String newFolder)
        Creates a directory with the name of the argument. If it already exists, it will be deleted and re-created.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the directory has been created

        Parameters:

        outputFolder - folder where contents of the Zip file will be saved to
